articles.title: Google says new undersea cable will triple internet speeds in South Africa - BusinessTech
articles.description: The new subsea Equiano cable linking Africa and Europe will significantly decrease internet costs and triple internet speeds in South Africa, says Google.
articles.content:
The new subsea Equiano cable linking Africa and Europe will significantly decrease internet costs and triple internet speeds in South Africa, says Google.

articles.author: RT
articles.title: Gas price in Europe soars above $1,900 per 1,000 cubic meters - RT
articles.description: European gas prices broke new record highs on Wednesday, rising sharply to above $1,900 per 1,000 cubic meters. That is equivalent to $186 per megawatt-hour in household terms.
articles.content:
According to data from the Intercontinental Exchange (ICE), the price of November futures on the TTF hub in the Netherlands rose to $1,936 per 1,000 cubic meters, as of 8:28am GMT.
